settings.custom_liquid:
Skin hydration is an important cause of health and wellness. Skin is an organ like your heart and lungs, but you must treat it delicately. Your skin gets dehydrated naturally because of its outermost layer called the epidermis. The epidermis is made up of cells that are known as keratinocytes. Keratinocytes get dehydrated due to lack of moisture. Dehydrated skin looks dull and tired and causes premature aging, fine lines and wrinkles.

Now you're asking how to keep skin hydrated. Well, thanks to the sea where most natural elements are found, we have brought Red Algae from the ocean for you. Studies have shown that it is one of the best ways to keep your skin healthy and glowing.

How to keep skin hydrated with Red Algae?
Red Algae is a miracle ingredient that can keep skin hydrated. It contains polysaccharides, which are carbohydrates with the maximum water-holding capacity. Research has shown that they have greater hydrating and moisturising effects than hyaluronic acid.

The polysaccharides in our Red Algae gel are long chains of sugars that help keep moisture in by forming a gel layer on top of your skin. This gel layer can hold onto water molecules that normally evaporate from your skin surface. This makes red algae an amazing ingredient for helping to prevent dryness and flakiness! Red Algae is also rich in antioxidants which help protect against free radicals and environmental stressors that cause damage to our cells.
